description: A dashboard for OpenShift Ingress/Route (HAProxy) monitoring.

panels.description: When was the last date and time HAProxy process reloaded
panels.title: HAProxy Process Started/Reloaded Date Time
Router Container Uptime Since Last Started/Restarted

panels.description: How long the HAProxy process has been started since last reloaded
panels.title: HAProxy Process Uptime Since Last Started/Reloaded

panels.description: Total of connection errors when HAProxy was not able to connect to backend i.e. pod(s)
panels.title: Total Backend Connection Errors

targets.expr: sum(haproxy_backend_http_responses_total{pod=~"$pod", exported_namespace=~"$namespace", route=~"$route", backend=~"$backend", code=~"$code"}) by (pod,route, code)

panels.description: Maximum observed number of active sessions.
panels.title: Maximum Active Sessions

panels.description: Average response latency of the last 1024 requests in milliseconds.
panels.title: Average Connect Latency

panels.description: Average response latency of the last 1024 requests in milliseconds.
panels.title: Average Response Latency

targets.expr:
sort_desc(
  topk(5, 
  avg(haproxy_server_http_average_response_latency_milliseconds{pod=~"$pod", exported_namespace=~"$namespace", route=~"$route"} != 0) 
  by (route, exported_pod) != 0))
sum(haproxy_server_http_responses_total{pod=~"$pod", exported_namespace=~"$namespace", route=~"$route", code=~"$code"}) by (route, exported_pod, code)

panels.description: Maximum observed number of active sessions.
panels.title: Maximum Active Sessions

panels.description: Average response latency of the last 1024 requests in milliseconds.
panels.title: Average Connect Latency

panels.description: Average response latency of the last 1024 requests in milliseconds.
panels.title: Average Response Latency

list.description: Project in OpenShift a.k.a Namespace in K8s
list.label: Project
list.name: namespace

title: OpenShift Ingress (HAProxy)
